message.content:
cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.GT, cs.CC

Reasoning: The problem of edge editing or modification of graphs is a well-studied topic in computer science, and can be applied to various subfields such as discrete mathematics (cs.DM), computational geometry (cs.CG), graph theory (cs.GT), and complexity theory (cs.CC). The specific problem of editing a graph to a connected graph of given degrees is closely related to graph connectivity (cs.DS), as well as graph coloring and partitioning (cs.DM). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.DM, cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.GT, and cs.CC.
